column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////We had to wait an hour for a table
column2: but the whole group thought it was well worth the wait.  The food was all delicious.  I had the napa omelet with gluten free honey cakes
column3: and it was great.   The omelet was bacon
column5: figs and havarti.   Odd combo but it really did work.   Others had skillets and cinnamon roll pancakes that looked delish too.
